title: Shakespeare's Shoreditch Theatre with Heather Knight
itunes:title: Shakespeare's Shoreditch Theatre with Heather Knight
itunes:subtitle: In this archive episode, Dan visits the site of The Theatre, the 16th-century playhouse where some of Shakespeare's works were first performed, to investigate the archaeology with Heather Knight, Senior Archaeologist from the Museum of London Arch...
description:
In this archive episode, Dan visits the site of The Theatre, the 16th-century playhouse where some of Shakespeare's works were first performed, to investigate the archaeology with Heather Knight, Senior Archaeologist from the Museum of London Archaeology.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
